about_the_game:
Game Introduction:

Digital Heartbeat：Unknown Lover

  A romance simulation game featuring full-motion live-action interactive storytelling. By a twist of fate, you become the CEO of an entertainment agency. Through a first-person perspective, you will meet, bond with, and fall in love with five male main characters—each with distinct personalities and looks—embarking on one immersive, sweet journey after another!

Meet Your Destined Lovers:

A gentle and restrained next-door big brother who conceals a huge secret: Jiang Kezhi

A lucky, younger 'puppy' who's willing to sacrifice himself for you: Lin Zhao

A proud and elite CEO who aids your growth while intending to exploit you: Lu Yiheng

An aloof operatic genius whose deadened heart rekindles because of you: Sang Yi

A enigmatic figure who places you in peril yet risks his own life to save you: Gu Chen

Will you stay loyal to your one true love, or succumb to the allure of all five? With relentless romantic pursuits from these men, there’s someone destined to steal your heart. The power to choose your love story is yours!

Product Highlights:

1. First-Person Perspective, Immersive Experience

  Digital Heartbeat：Unknown Lover is filmed entirely in a first-person perspective, enhancing your connection to every scene and storyline. Dive into dynamic interactions and live-action simulations, where you’ll feel fully immersed in romantic encounters that blur the line between fiction and reality.

2. Multiple Branches & Endings, Hidden Storyline & Bonus Scene

  Free from traditional romance games! With over 100 branching story paths, 15 distinct endings, and secret plotlines waiting to be uncovered, every choice reshapes your journey. Unlock achievements, repeatedly explore hidden narratives, and discover surprises that reward curiosity.

3. Diverse Gameplay, Full of ups and downs

  Beyond dialogue choices, shape your story through environmental exploration and item collection. Scour scenes for critical clues, use unique props to influence outcomes, and experience a layered narrative where even the smallest interaction can alter fate.

4. Highly Attractive, Unforgettable Romance

  Five characters with distinct personalities are available to pursue—some gentle, some sunny, some domineering, some profound, and some mysterious. There is something for everyone. These five male leads will bring you an ultimate romantic experience

developers: 咪咕互动娱乐有限公司
name: Digital Heartbeat：Unknown Lover

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel core i5或AMD equivalent或以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

publishers: 咪咕互动娱乐有限公司
short_description: “Digital Heartbeat：Unknown Lover”- Experience a unique blend of romance and technology in this immersive dating adventure. Engage with the story from a first-person view, interact with real actors, and enjoy multi-sensory gameplay for an ultra-realistic romantic experience.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
